languages.text: "Твои усилия по установлению порядка приводят лишь к большей разрухе. Если бы ты принял мир таким неидеальным, какой он есть... Это бы облегчило твое существование".
"Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."
languages.original_text: "Твои усилия по установлению порядка приводят лишь к большей разрухе. Если бы ты принял мир таким неидеальным, какой он есть... Это бы облегчило твое существование".

traits.locale_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."
"Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."
"Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."
"Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."
"Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

languages.text: 「秩序をもたらそうとするお前の努力は、かえってさらなる破滅を招くだけだ。もしこの世界を、その不完全なまま受け入れることができれば…お前の生も、もう少し楽になるだろうに」
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: 「秩序をもたらそうとするお前の努力は、かえってさらなる破滅を招くだけだ。もしこの世界を、その不完全なまま受け入れることができれば…お前の生も、もう少し楽になるだろうに」

languages.text: "Eure Bemühungen, für Ordnung zu sorgen, führen nur zu noch größerem Ruin. Würdet Ihr die Welt in ihrem unvollkommenen Zustand akzeptieren ... es würde Euch die Existenz erleichtern."
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Bemühungen, für Ordnung zu sorgen, führen nur zu noch größerem Ruin. Würdet Ihr die Welt in ihrem unvollkommenen Zustand akzeptieren ... es würde Euch die Existenz erleichtern."

languages.text: « Vos efforts pour faire régner l'ordre ne font qu'engendrer plus de malheur. Si seulement vous acceptiez le monde dans son état imparfait... votre existence en serait grandement facilitée. »
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: « Vos efforts pour faire régner l'ordre ne font qu'engendrer plus de malheur. Si seulement vous acceptiez le monde dans son état imparfait... votre existence en serait grandement facilitée. »

languages.text: «Tus esfuerzos por mantener el orden solo provocarán un desastre mayor. Si aceptases el mundo en su estado de imperfección... tu existencia sería más llevadera».
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: «Tus esfuerzos por mantener el orden solo provocarán un desastre mayor. Si aceptases el mundo en su estado de imperfección... tu existencia sería más llevadera».

languages.text: “你渴望散播秩序，但这只会招致毁灭。如果你愿意接受这个不完美的世界……你自己也能更轻松些。”
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: “你渴望散播秩序，但这只会招致毁灭。如果你愿意接受这个不完美的世界……你自己也能更轻松些。”

languages.text: "Asayişi sağlama çabaların, yıkımdan başka şey getirmiyor. Dünyayı kusurlarıyla kabul etsen rahat bir nefes alacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Your efforts to bring order only lead to greater ruin. If you would accept the world in its imperfect state... it would ease your existence."

traits.locale_text: "Asayişi sağlama çabaların yıkımdan başka şey getirmiyor. Dünyayı kusurlarıyla kabul etsen rahat bir nefes alacaksın."
